dcterms:description: The Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) is utilized for device-based sensing to localize mobile phones using signals from satellites.
dcterms:title: Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS)

dcterms:creator: Q. Shi
L. Liu
S. Zhang
S. Cui
dcterms:description: The device-free sensing technique allows for the estimation of locations and velocities of targets that do not actively communicate, using reflected signals in an OFDM cellular network.
dcterms:title: Device-free sensing technique

dcterms:creator: M. I. Skolnik
dcterms:description: The radar range equation provides the mathematical framework for understanding the performance of radar systems in estimating the distance to targets.
dcterms:title: Radar range equation

dcterms:creator: Q. Wang
L. Liu
S. Zhang
C. M. Lau
dcterms:description: Trilateration-based device-free sensing utilizes two base stations and one passive intelligent reflecting surface (IRS) to estimate the location of passive targets.
dcterms:title: Trilateration-based device-free sensing

dcterms:creator: H. Wymeersch
J. Lien
M. Z. Win
dcterms:description: Cooperative localization in wireless networks involves multiple base stations working together to improve the accuracy of target localization.
dcterms:title: Cooperative localization in wireless networks

dcterms:creator: M. D. Renzo
et al.
dcterms:description: Smart radio environments empowered by reconfigurable AI meta-surfaces enhance wireless communication and sensing capabilities.
dcterms:title: Smart radio environments empowered by reconfigurable AI meta-surfaces

dcterms:creator: Q. Wu
S. Zhang
B. Zheng
C. You
R. Zhang
dcterms:description: Intelligent reflecting surface-aided wireless communications enhance the performance of wireless networks by utilizing reflective surfaces.
dcterms:title: Intelligent reflecting surface-aided wireless communications
